fields_of_interest: Competition, Enlargement, Business and Industry, Single market, Public Health
eu_initiatives:
Issues related to the implementation of  the Directive 2011/62/EU known as the Falsified Medicines Directive 
 
Access to medicines
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: EAEPC is a member of the Federation of European and International Associations (FAIB)
goals__remit: Safeguarding the free movement principle for licensed medical products within the EU, as article 28; counteract attempts to restrict freedom of choice for consumers via trading patterns in breach of Articles 81 & 82 EC Treaty; assist the European Commission in achieving its Single Market objective and improve health standards through the provision of safe and innovative medicines at lower costs.
